title: Sweetcoiner
author: Sweetcoiner
content: Have be thinking about the importance of cryptocurrency, especially BTC in our society today and the nearest future. And how is going to improve the Society especially our environment and economic.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: I personally believe that if Bitcoin will continue growing at the rate it is now, it is going to help our society in the way we have never seen before. The basic reason for this is because the money we use, fiat currencies, are being printed out of thin air. And this creates hyperinflation, economic instability and generally weakens society. But with Bitcoin, we have a cryptocurrency that isn't printed out of thin air; so long as people continue using it, we don't have to worry about inflation because there can't be inflation without massive money printing as seen in modern day economies. Bitcoin may be imperfect, but it is infinitely better than what we use now.

comments.author: AakZaki
comments.body: If you ask how important it is for now, bitcoin is still not that important for most people, but for people who already know about the potential of bitcoin, of course bitcoin is very important and becomes a good payment option in the future. Bitcoin is still a volatile digital currency with a fairly high risk, but behind that bitcoin is decentralized or not regulated by anyone. Bitcoin is an optional payment instrument and a good investment asset for the long term.Indirectly bitcoin will be very useful to grow our economy and become a good investment tool with some control done.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: It seems to me that society is not yet quite ready to accept bitcoin. So far, not so many people from all over the world use it. Yes, of course, the user base is expanding and there are places where you can pay with BTC-th, but we still continue to live in the world of traditional financial instruments. Bitcoin is just trying to claim his rights. If bitcoin dominates in the world of the future, then this will undoubtedly be a huge step for human society, which will allow it to rise a step higher in development, because technology has always pushed for this. Perhaps bitcoin will change people's lives for the better. At least in terms of ecology. Eliminating paper money from the general circulation, for the production of which a lot of wood is spent all over the world, and switching to btc, our descendants will only be grateful.
